Package com.facebook.buck.cli.parameter_extractors

A package for interfaces that extract parameters from com.facebook.buck.cli.AbstractCommand descendants.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandRunnerParameters
    Extract fields from com.facebook.buck.cli.CommandRunnerParams without a dependency on com.facebook.buck.cli
    ProjectGeneratorParameters
    Command line switches for project generation
    ProjectViewParameters
    'Simple fields' from the com.facebook.buck.cli.ProjectCommand that the com.facebook.buck.ide.intellij.projectview.ProjectView needs

Package com.facebook.buck.cli.parameter_extractors Description

A package for interfaces that extract parameters from com.facebook.buck.cli.AbstractCommand descendants. Those descendants can then implement one or more of these interfaces, and pass the interface to out-of-package implementations of commands, instead of having to pass a large number of parameters to those implementations. When an implementation needs, say, a new command line switch, one just changes the interface and (maybe) adds a new method to the AbstractCommand descendant; there is no need to modify the implementation's parameter list or call site; when an implementation is behind a 'helper', the helper just passes the extractor interface, with no need to add fields to the helper and change multiple parameters lists and call sites.
